main_definition: Adverb expressing completeness, entirety or absolute agreement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing complete agreement with someone else's opinion; wholeheartedly in support of something
meanings_and_examples.example: I totally agree that we should go to the park today.
She was totally exhausted after running a marathon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Including everything, absolutely all; entirely; utterly
meanings_and_examples.example: The new policy is totally changing the way we do things in our office.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving full attention to someone or something; focusing on a subject
meanings_and_examples.example: He was totally focused on his work and didn't notice when the meeting ended.
